mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lighting of the Lawn
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Yokum, Rebecca, 1977-
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Part of Lighting of the Lawn. The lights were turned on December 5, 2001 in an event that included tours of pavilions for students and community members, a performance by the Virginia Gentlemen, and basketball coach Pete Gillen reading a student-written poem about an epic clash between the Grinch and the Cavalier.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
